## MinNode class

Returns the minimum of two values

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class MinNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns min(a, b) for each component. Both inputs must be the same type (float, vec2, vec3, or vec4). Component-wise for vectors.
